relatedRecords.name: AllThingsRTC 2020
relatedRecords.description: The Agora AllThingsRTC 2020 event will take place at the Metreon City View in San Francisco on August 27. Submit to the AllThingsRTC 2020 Conference Call for Papers and become a recognized expert in Real-Time Communications (RTC).

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.

relatedRecords.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
relatedRecords.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.
